channel.title: Battlescape Blitz Source
channel.description: can anyone send me a link for the battlescape blitz source? mine got deleted.

item.title: Battlescape Blitz Source
item.dc:creator: @Palidino76 Palidino76
item.description:
@Palidino76 wrote:

Called enzo:

Lmao in my eyes , battlescape is very unstable source… atleast i cant work wit it… ! …

Your right, cheez 80 is very unstable

[quote=“Fr33b1e, post:8, topic:132289”]It’s just tutorials off of Rune-Server lmao. Now he has some sort of “account grabber”, that he’s going to use on the people who buy it.

Palidino76= scammer 4 lyphe[/quote]
You have no right calling me a scammer when I havent scammed anyone noob

Fr33b1e:

Some parts of it are coded by him. But if you look through, you’ll see a bunch of // by username by his codes.

Wow, obviously not my source then retard, my source only contains what was originally in cheez80, the rest is mine

[quote=“bakatool, post:5, topic:132289”]http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=22486

this should show enough info why it should be released very good given reason -.- no proof needed …

What can i say born scammer for life.[/quote]
Dude do you know anything at all? If you knew any java at all you would understand how this works and no thats not true. That goes for all of you who think im a scammer

Fr33b1e:

Pali, no offense, YOU’RE RETARDED. If you didn’t want it being sent around, you shouldn’t have sold it. I got a free copy of it, and oh shit, there’s so many tutorials from Rune-Server on it bud.

Post links for proof please
I went through the first few pages in the tut section there and foudn these that I used:
http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=17780 - made by me
That would be the first 5 pages i went through, wasnt gonna waste my time gouing thro every page

Read full topic
